TopicTitle: Once Squad is finished with KSP....

Articles.Content:
....I would love for them to tackle inner space next. Just like KSP is filling a void left empty since...The Halley Project?, I would love for Squad to tackle a game about exploring the oceans and creating underwater habitats. I think the last game I played that did that was Infocom\'s Seastalker.

Just like I don\'t understand why space exploration is so under-served, I really don\'t understand why adventures under the sea aren\'t more popular. I find oceanography as fascinating as astronomy. In fact, I always thought the two are sort of linked.

Anyway, just something I was thinking about as I was splashing around the pool. Would be neat to have a game based around subs and sonar next. 8)

BTW: what was the name of that TV show with Roy Sheider as the head of some sort of underwater colony?

Are you talking about a Kerbal \'series\'?

I\'ve been thinking about that. I mean, I\'d like there to be some consistency, like all the games are sandboxes and you build your crafts in them, but it would just be awesome.
I never considered it as a series, but now that I think about it, it sort of makes sense! 'Explore inner and outer space with Kerbals!'
